description: This file defines a Python class 'Groq' for interacting with Groq models, including methods for client management, request formatting, message handling, and response parsing. It integrates with external Groq SDK components and handles streaming and asynchronous API calls.

classes.name: Groq
classes.description: A class for interacting with Groq models, providing methods for chat completion, streaming, and response parsing.

methods.name: _get_client_params
methods.description: Constructs client parameters, fetching API key from environment if not set.

methods.name: get_client
methods.description: Returns a Groq client instance, creating it if necessary.

methods.name: get_async_client
methods.description: Returns an asynchronous Groq client instance, creating it if necessary.

methods.name: get_request_params
methods.description: Prepares request parameters for API calls, including optional tools and response format.

methods.name: to_dict
methods.description: Serializes the model instance to a dictionary.

methods.name: format_message
methods.description: Formats a Message object into the structure expected by Groq API.

methods.name: invoke
methods.description: Performs a synchronous chat completion request.

methods.name: ainvoke
methods.description: Performs an asynchronous chat completion request.

methods.name: invoke_stream
methods.description: Performs a streaming chat completion request.

methods.name: ainvoke_stream
methods.description: Performs an asynchronous streaming chat completion request.

methods.name: parse_tool_calls
methods.description: Builds tool call data from streamed tool call chunks.

methods.name: parse_provider_response
methods.description: Parses Groq API response into a ModelResponse object.

methods.name: parse_provider_response_delta
methods.description: Parses streaming response chunks into a ModelResponse object.
